> Perceptor remained quiet, he sensed that somethign was close to him 
> but his poor sight couldnt help him alot; in spite of that he was quiet. 

The constuction-driods continued up to Perceptor  and then past him as they began work on a section of the wall quite near to his location. With quick movements they sliced off small bits of stone from the wall and began hueing out what may eentually be some sort of opening. 

Their work is comptent and quiet loud, it will be difficult fo Perceptor to hear anything further with the sounds of the construction going on next to him. 

(TAG: Perceptor)

> Darkfate was impatient that the "Show" starts

For the moment nothing happened excpet for various glowing lights that appeared on the consoles. Readouts go across the screens indicating the the machines were in a priming stage of the proccess. All indicators were showing that all was proceeding according to plan. 

From above Darkfate the cieling began to rumble as bits of pebble fell on him . . . 

(TAG: Darkfate)

Preston
